page.title: 08Education:Pupil's view
page.content: "Life to me at Harrytown High School is an adaptation of life at home.It has all the joy,sorrow and chaos of any home but among this lies the ambiguous,logarithmically accelerating life that we all have to cope with.The speed is just incredible.The staff expect the pupil to be able to change from German to English in just five minutes and also to recall all of the relevant information as soon as the classroom door opens.When the final bell sounds at the end of the day a feeling of relief is felt knowing that from now on the day can be spent doing what I like most-nothing!" Bredbury Comprehensive(1600 pupils) and Harrytown R.C.High School(750 pupils)are secondary schools facing each other across Harrytown Lane,Bredbury.
